name: Yu-Gi-Oh! ONLINE 3 Avatar File
summary: Learn about .Y3A files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When creating an Avatar, players specify the appearance properties, including the gender, hair color, and clothing.

description: Game file used by Yu-Gi-Oh! ONLINE 3: Duel Accelerator, an online card playing game; saves information about an avatar, which is the player's virtual person in the game; used for loading the avatar for dueling against other players.
